ashish_portfolio_home_tagline: A passionate Senior Frontend Developer dedicated to crafting elegant, high-performance, and user-centric digital experiences that bring innovative ideas to life.
ashish_portfolio_about_intro_p1: Hello! I'm <1>Ashish Dubey</1>, a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of expertise in front-end development, specializing in a suite of modern technologies including <3>Angular</3>, <5>TypeScript</5>, <7>JavaScript</7>, <9>React.js</9>, <11>Next.js</11>, <13>Electron</13>, and <15>Node.js</15>.
ashish_portfolio_about_intro_p2: Proven ability to design and deploy scalable web and desktop applications across Windows and Mac platforms. Skilled in leading cross-functional teams, automating workflows, and delivering high-quality software aligned with business goals.
ashish_portfolio_goals_short_term_p: Secure a challenging Frontend Developer role where I can leverage my expertise in <1>React</1> and <3>Next.js</3>, contribute to impactful projects, and gain valuable insights from experienced mentors.
ashish_portfolio_goals_mid_term_p: Progress into a <1>Full-Stack Developer</1> position, taking ownership of complex, high-impact features while actively mentoring and supporting junior developers.
ashish_portfolio_goals_long_term_p: Advance to a <1>Technical Lead or Solutions Architect</1> role, shaping technical strategy, fostering innovation, and delivering exceptional user experiences.
experiences.backbase.title: Senior Frontend Developer
experiences.backbase.description: Leading the development of enterprise-grade digital banking solutions at Backbase, with a strong focus on building scalable UI components and robust frontend architecture. Driving innovation across customer-facing journeys like Notifications, KYC, and Account Alerts, while ensuring security, performance, and seamless integration with the Backbase Engagement Banking Platform. Actively mentor peers and contribute to best practices that accelerate delivery and elevate overall product quality.
experiences.backbase.point1: Developing responsive, scalable, and accessible front-end applications using Angular, TypeScript, and Backbase Design System.
experiences.backbase.point2: Building and refactoring key modules such as Notification Preferences, Account Alerts, and KYC Journeys.
experiences.backbase.point3: Integrated with Backbase SDKs and services, including Flow, Digital Onboarding, and Digital Assist, driving faster feature delivery.
experiences.backbase.point4: Contributed to the ModelBank reference implementation, accelerating customer go-lives through reusable journeys and flows.
experiences.backbase.point5: Automated tests using Selenium, Karma, and Cucumber, reducing manual QA efforts by 30%.
experiences.thales.title: Senior Software Engineer

experiences.thales.description: Spearheading feature development for the flagship SafeNet Trusted Access (STA) platform, focusing on robust architecture and scalable UI components. experiences.thales.point1: Led the design and development of SafeNet Trusted Access (STA), a cloud-based access management service integrating SSO and enhanced security measures.
experiences.thales.point2: Developed reusable UI components for data input and calculations, ensuring consistency across multiple applications.
experiences.thales.point3: Troubleshot and resolved critical development and testing issues, ensuring timely project delivery.
experiences.thales.point4: Mentored team members, enhancing overall productivity and technical capabilities.
experiences.thales.point5: Automated tests using Selenium, Karma, and Cucumber, reducing manual QA efforts by 30%.
experiences.thales2.title: Senior Software Engineer
experiences.thales2.company: Thales DIS Technology India Pvt. Ltd
experiences.thales2.description: Focused on the front-end development of secure, cloud-based access management solutions. My primary contributions involved building high-performance, cross-platform compatible UI components with React and Redux, ensuring seamless API integration and significantly improving code quality through rigorous code reviews.
experiences.thales2.point1: Designed and developed secure cloud-based access management solutions for Reverse Proxy and Agent Admin projects.
experiences.thales2.point2: Built high-performance front-end components using React.js and Redux with cross-platform compatibility.
experiences.thales2.point3: Collaborated with backend teams for seamless API integration and real-time data synchronization.
experiences.thales2.point4: Enhanced code quality via code reviews and debugging, reducing production issues by 25%.
experiences.thinksys.title: Software Engineer
experiences.thinksys.description: Specialized in front-end development, creating dynamic and responsive UI components using Angular and Bootstrap. I was instrumental in implementing interactive data visualizations with Highcharts.js and resolving key performance bottlenecks, directly contributing to a more stable and user-friendly application.
experiences.thinksys.point1: Developed and deployed Angular UI components, streamlining project workflows.
experiences.thinksys.point2: Built responsive Bootstrap-based UI with interactive data visualizations using Highcharts.js.
experiences.thinksys.point3: Debugged and resolved key functionality issues, improving overall application performance.
experiences.craterzone.title: Software Developer
experiences.craterzone.description: As a versatile developer, I contributed to the end-to-end development of diverse applications for both government and commercial clients. I was deeply involved in the agile development lifecycle, from sprint planning to delivery, utilizing Angular and React.js to build robust and efficient solutions.
experiences.craterzone.point1: Played a pivotal role in application design and development for government and commercial projects.
experiences.craterzone.point2: Led sprint planning sessions and contributed to agile ceremonies to ensure timely delivery.
experiences.craterzone.point3: Built robust applications leveraging Angular and React.js, reducing overall development cycles.

descriptions.sta: SafeNet Trusted Access is an access management and authentication service that enables quick deployment of MFA, enforcing the right authentication for the right user. It simplifies access to cloud and enterprise apps, streamlines identity management, and reduces password-related issues. It also provides a unified view of access events to ensure secure, trusted access across all applications.
descriptions.sas: SAS Agent Admin may refer to either an administrator of the SAS analytics platform responsible for installation and maintenance, or a Standardised Agency System admin who manages agents selling government savings schemes in India. The meaning depends on the context
descriptions.reverse_proxy: A reverse proxy is a server that sits in front of one or more web servers, receiving incoming client requests and forwarding them to the appropriate backend server. It acts as an intermediary, masking the true origin servers and providing benefits like enhanced security, performance, and reliability.
descriptions.luminous: Luminous System Management may refer to solar energy monitoring via the Luminous ConnectX app, inventory management for e-commerce brands through joinluminous.com, or support services for Luminous power backup products like inverters and batteries.
descriptions.wynk: Wynk Music, launched on 1 September 2014 by Airtel Digital Limited, was an Indian music streaming service available in India, Sri Lanka, and 15 African countries. It supported 14 languages and offered programs to help independent artists with mentorship, distribution, and monetization.
descriptions.kyc: KYC (Know Your Customer) is a mandatory process for verifying a client’s identity when opening an account and periodically thereafter. It ensures customers are who they claim to be, and banks may refuse services if KYC requirements are not met.
descriptions.nec_energy: NEC Energy Solutions develops advanced energy storage systems for applications such as renewable energy integration, grid stabilization, and backup power. Their projects focus on enhancing energy efficiency, reliability, and sustainability for utilities, businesses, and large-scale infrastructure

texts.testimonial_text_prakher: Working with them was both professional and seamless. Their strong technical skills and ability to quickly adapt to evolving requirements were truly impressive.
texts.testimonial_text_samiksha: Clear communication, attention to detail, and a commitment to delivering on time made them an invaluable part of the project team.
texts.testimonial_text_shubham: Their ability to transform complex Figma designs into flawless, responsive interfaces was nothing short of outstanding.
texts.testimonial_text_khushboo: Their problem-solving skills, precision, and proactive approach consistently brought high-quality results to the table.
texts.testimonial_text_srinivas: A dependable developer who combines strong technical expertise with excellent collaboration, ensuring projects run smoothly from start to finish.
texts.testimonial_text_michael: Consistently delivers clean, maintainable code while keeping a sharp focus on performance and user experience.
texts.testimonial_text_anamika: Their ability to bridge business requirements with technical solutions was outstanding. They ensured delivery aligned perfectly with client expectations.
